title: My second home
creator_credit: ACMI Digital Storytelling, Memet Gunes and ACMI
brief_description: Memet Gunes was one of the lucky few people in his village in Turkey to receive an education. When he migrated to Australia with his family he found a place full of possibility and opportunity.
creator_credit_for_label: ACMI Digital Storytelling, Memet Gunes and ACMI
